summary: Page 31 (book page 51/nun-aleph). Covers continuation of section 118, then sections 119-125. All section numbers match the image. The sections continue within the 'צדקה וגמילות חסדים' topic. Section 125 cuts off mid-sentence at the bottom.

issues.description: The text has 'מ"מ כיון שחון מקיים המצוה' - the word 'שחון' seems like a misread. It likely should be 'שבזמן שמקיים' or simply 'שמקיים'. The word is unclear in the image.
The source ref has a leading vav: 'ושארית מנחם פי' תבוא'. Should be 'שארית מנחם פי' תבוא' without the conjunctive prefix.
